00025 /*! \file
00026   \brief OCS blitter implementation with WISHBONE master and slave interface.
00027  */
00028 
00029 /*! \brief \copybrief ocs_blitter.v
00030 
00031 List of blitter registers:
00032 \verbatim
00033 Implemented:
00034    BLTCON0     ~040  W   A       Blitter control register 0
00035    BLTCON1     ~042  W   A( E )  Blitter control register 1
00036    BLTAFWM     ~044  W   A       Blitter first word mask for source A
00037    BLTALWM     ~046  W   A       Blitter last word mask for source A
00038    BLTCPTH   + ~048  W   A       Blitter pointer to source C (high 3 bits)
00039    BLTCPTL   + ~04A  W   A       Blitter pointer to source C (low 15 bits)
00040    BLTBPTH   + ~04C  W   A       Blitter pointer to source B (high 3 bits)
00041    BLTBPTL   + ~04E  W   A       Blitter pointer to source B (low 15 bits)
00042    BLTAPTH   + ~050  W   A( E )  Blitter pointer to source A (high 3 bits)
00043    BLTAPTL   + ~052  W   A       Blitter pointer to source A (low 15 bits)
00044    BLTDPTH   + ~054  W   A       Blitter pointer to destination D (high 3 bits)
00045    BLTDPTL   + ~056  W   A       Blitter pointer to destination D (low 15 bits)
00046    BLTSIZE     ~058  W   A       Blitter start and size (window width,height)
00047    BLTCMOD     ~060  W   A       Blitter modulo for source C
00048    BLTBMOD     ~062  W   A       Blitter modulo for source B
00049    BLTAMOD     ~064  W   A       Blitter modulo for source A
00050    BLTDMOD     ~066  W   A       Blitter modulo for destination D
00051    BLTCDAT   % ~070  W   A       Blitter source C data register
00052    BLTBDAT   % ~072  W   A       Blitter source B data register
00053    BLTADAT   % ~074  W   A       Blitter source A data register
00054 Not implemented:
00055    BLTDDAT   & *000  ER  A       Blitter destination early read (dummy address)
00056 \endverbatim
00057 */
00058 module ocs_blitter(
00059     //% \name Clock and reset

00060     //% @{
00061     input               CLK_I,
00062     input               reset_n,
00063     //% @}
00064     
00065     //% \name WISHBONE master

00066     //% @{
00067     output reg          CYC_O,
00068     output reg          STB_O,
00069     output reg          WE_O,
00070     output reg [31:2]   ADR_O,
00071     output reg [3:0]    SEL_O,
00072     output reg [31:0]   master_DAT_O,
00073     input [31:0]        master_DAT_I,
00074     input               ACK_I,
00075     //% @}
00076     
00077     //% \name WISHBONE slave

00078     //% @{
00079     input               CYC_I,
00080     input               STB_I,
00081     input               WE_I,
00082     input [8:2]         ADR_I,
00083     input [3:0]         SEL_I,
00084     input [31:0]        slave_DAT_I,
00085     output reg          ACK_O,
00086     //% @}
00087     
00088     //% \name Internal OCS ports

00089     //% @{
00090     input [10:0]        dma_con,
00091     
00092     output reg          blitter_irq,
00093     output reg          blitter_zero,
00094     output reg          blitter_busy
00095     //% @}
00096 );
00097 
00098 reg [15:0] a_first_word_mask;
00099 reg [15:0] a_last_word_mask;
00100 reg [15:0] blt_con0;
00101 reg [15:0] blt_con1;
00102 reg [15:0] blt_size;
00103 reg [5:0] blt_width_in_words;
00104 
00105 reg [63:0] a_dat;
00106 reg [63:0] b_dat;
00107 reg [47:0] c_dat;
00108 reg [15:0] a_mod;
00109 reg [15:0] b_mod;
00110 reg [15:0] c_mod;
00111 reg [15:0] d_mod;
00112 reg [31:0] a_address;
00113 reg [31:0] b_address;
00114 reg [31:0] c_address;
00115 reg [31:0] d_address;
00116 reg [3:0] a_shift_saved;
00117 reg [3:0] b_shift_saved;
00118 
00119 reg [1:0] a_avail;
00120 reg [1:0] b_avail;
00121 reg [1:0] c_avail;
00122 reg line_single;
00123 reg fill_carry;
00124 
00125 reg max_width;
00126 
00127 reg [3:0] state;
00128 parameter [3:0]
00129     S_IDLE          = 3'd0,
00130     S_CHECK_LOAD    = 3'd1,
00131     S_LOAD_A        = 3'd2,
00132     S_LOAD_B        = 3'd3,
00133     S_LOAD_C        = 3'd4,
00134     S_CHECK_SAVE    = 3'd5,
00135     S_SAVE_D        = 3'd6;
00136 
00137 wire reverse;
00138 // reverse: LINE=0, DESC=1
00139 assign reverse = (blt_con1[0] == 1'b0 && blt_con1[1] == 1'b1);
00140 
00141 // mask, even when A channel not enabled
00142 wire [15:0] a_dat_mask;
00143 assign a_dat_mask = 
00144     (a_enabled == 1'b1)? 16'hFFFF :
00145     (blt_width_in_words[5:0] == blt_size[5:0] && blt_width_in_words[5:0] == 6'd1)? a_first_word_mask & a_last_word_mask :
00146     (blt_width_in_words[5:0] == blt_size[5:0])? a_first_word_mask :
00147     (blt_width_in_words[5:0] == 6'd1)? a_last_word_mask :
00148     16'hFFFF;
00149 
00150 wire [63:0] a_dat_final;
00151 assign a_dat_final = (reverse == 1'b0) ? 
00152     { a_dat[63:48], a_dat[47:32] & a_dat_mask, a_dat[31:0] } :
00153     { a_dat[63:32], a_dat[31:16] & a_dat_mask, a_dat[15:0] };
00154 
00155 wire [15:0] a_shifted;
00156 assign a_shifted =
00157     (line_single == 1'b1 && blt_con1[0] == 1'b1 && blt_con1[1] == 1'b1) ? 16'd0 :
00158     (a_shift_saved == 4'd0) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[47:32] : a_dat_final[31:16]) :
00159     (a_shift_saved == 4'd1) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[48:33] : a_dat_final[30:15]) :
00160     (a_shift_saved == 4'd2) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[49:34] : a_dat_final[29:14]) :
00161     (a_shift_saved == 4'd3) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[50:35] : a_dat_final[28:13]) :
00162     (a_shift_saved == 4'd4) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[51:36] : a_dat_final[27:12]) :
00163     (a_shift_saved == 4'd5) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[52:37] : a_dat_final[26:11]) :
00164     (a_shift_saved == 4'd6) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[53:38] : a_dat_final[25:10]) :
00165     (a_shift_saved == 4'd7) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[54:39] : a_dat_final[24:9]) :
00166     (a_shift_saved == 4'd8) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[55:40] : a_dat_final[23:8]) :
00167     (a_shift_saved == 4'd9) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[56:41] : a_dat_final[22:7]) :
00168     (a_shift_saved == 4'd10) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[57:42] : a_dat_final[21:6]) :
00169     (a_shift_saved == 4'd11) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[58:43] : a_dat_final[20:5]) :
00170     (a_shift_saved == 4'd12) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[59:44] : a_dat_final[19:4]) :
00171     (a_shift_saved == 4'd13) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[60:45] : a_dat_final[18:3]) :
00172     (a_shift_saved == 4'd14) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[61:46] : a_dat_final[17:2]) :
00173     ((reverse == 1'b0) ? a_dat_final[62:47] : a_dat_final[16:1]);
00174 
00175 wire [15:0] b_shifted;
00176 assign b_shifted =
00177     (b_shift_saved == 4'd0) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[47:32] : b_dat[31:16]) :
00178     (b_shift_saved == 4'd1) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[48:33] : b_dat[30:15]) :
00179     (b_shift_saved == 4'd2) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[49:34] : b_dat[29:14]) :
00180     (b_shift_saved == 4'd3) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[50:35] : b_dat[28:13]) :
00181     (b_shift_saved == 4'd4) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[51:36] : b_dat[27:12]) :
00182     (b_shift_saved == 4'd5) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[52:37] : b_dat[26:11]) :
00183     (b_shift_saved == 4'd6) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[53:38] : b_dat[25:10]) :
00184     (b_shift_saved == 4'd7) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[54:39] : b_dat[24:9]) :
00185     (b_shift_saved == 4'd8) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[55:40] : b_dat[23:8]) :
00186     (b_shift_saved == 4'd9) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[56:41] : b_dat[22:7]) :
00187     (b_shift_saved == 4'd10) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[57:42] : b_dat[21:6]) :
00188     (b_shift_saved == 4'd11) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[58:43] : b_dat[20:5]) :
00189     (b_shift_saved == 4'd12) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[59:44] : b_dat[19:4]) :
00190     (b_shift_saved == 4'd13) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[60:45] : b_dat[18:3]) :
00191     (b_shift_saved == 4'd14) ? ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[61:46] : b_dat[17:2]) :
00192     ((reverse == 1'b0) ? b_dat[62:47] : b_dat[16:1]);
00193 
00194 wire [15:0] b_shifted_final;
00195 assign b_shifted_final = (blt_con1[0] == 1'b0) ? b_shifted : ( (b_shifted[0] == 1'b0) ? 16'd0 :  16'hFFFF );
00196 
00197 wire [15:0] c_selected;
00198 assign c_selected = (reverse == 1'b0) ? c_dat[47:32] : c_dat[15:0];
00199 
00200 wire [15:0] minterm_output;
00201 assign minterm_output = {
00202     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[15], b_shifted_final[15], c_selected[15]} ],
00203     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[14], b_shifted_final[14], c_selected[14]} ],
00204     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[13], b_shifted_final[13], c_selected[13]} ],
00205     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[12], b_shifted_final[12], c_selected[12]} ],
00206     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[11], b_shifted_final[11], c_selected[11]} ],
00207     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[10], b_shifted_final[10], c_selected[10]} ],
00208     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[9], b_shifted_final[9], c_selected[9]} ],
00209     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[8], b_shifted_final[8], c_selected[8]} ],
00210     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[7], b_shifted_final[7], c_selected[7]} ],
00211     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[6], b_shifted_final[6], c_selected[6]} ],
00212     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[5], b_shifted_final[5], c_selected[5]} ],
00213     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[4], b_shifted_final[4], c_selected[4]} ],
00214     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[3], b_shifted_final[3], c_selected[3]} ],
00215     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[2], b_shifted_final[2], c_selected[2]} ],
00216     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[1], b_shifted_final[1], c_selected[1]} ],
00217     blt_con0[ {1'b0, a_shifted[0], b_shifted_final[0], c_selected[0]} ]
00218 };
00219 wire [15:0] xor_chains;
00220 assign xor_chains = {                  
00221     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1]  ^ minterm_output[2]  ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4]  ^ minterm_output[5]  ^
00222                         minterm_output[6]  ^ minterm_output[7]  ^ minterm_output[8]  ^ minterm_output[9] ^ minterm_output[10] ^ minterm_output[11] ^
00223                         minterm_output[12] ^ minterm_output[13] ^ minterm_output[14],
00224     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1]  ^ minterm_output[2]  ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4]  ^ minterm_output[5]  ^
00225                         minterm_output[6]  ^ minterm_output[7]  ^ minterm_output[8]  ^ minterm_output[9] ^ minterm_output[10] ^ minterm_output[11] ^
00226                         minterm_output[12] ^ minterm_output[13],
00227     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2] ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4]  ^ minterm_output[5]  ^
00228                         minterm_output[6] ^ minterm_output[7] ^ minterm_output[8] ^ minterm_output[9] ^ minterm_output[10] ^ minterm_output[11] ^
00229                         minterm_output[12],
00230     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2] ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4]  ^ minterm_output[5]  ^
00231                         minterm_output[6] ^ minterm_output[7] ^ minterm_output[8] ^ minterm_output[9] ^ minterm_output[10] ^ minterm_output[11],
00232     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2] ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4]  ^ minterm_output[5]  ^
00233                         minterm_output[6] ^ minterm_output[7] ^ minterm_output[8] ^ minterm_output[9] ^ minterm_output[10],
00234     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2] ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4] ^ minterm_output[5]   ^
00235                         minterm_output[6] ^ minterm_output[7] ^ minterm_output[8] ^ minterm_output[9],
00236     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2] ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4] ^ minterm_output[5]   ^
00237                         minterm_output[6] ^ minterm_output[7] ^ minterm_output[8],
00238     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2] ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4] ^ minterm_output[5]   ^
00239                         minterm_output[6] ^ minterm_output[7],
00240     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2] ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4] ^ minterm_output[5]   ^
00241                         minterm_output[6],
00242     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2] ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4] ^ minterm_output[5],
00243     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2] ^ minterm_output[3] ^ minterm_output[4],
00244     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2] ^ minterm_output[3],
00245     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1] ^ minterm_output[2],
00246     minterm_output[0] ^ minterm_output[1],               
00247     minterm_output[0],                
00248     1'b0
00249 };
00250 wire [15:0] final_output;
00251 assign final_output = 
00252     (blt_con1[0] == 1'b1 || (blt_con1[3] == 1'b0 && blt_con1[4] == 1'b0)) ? minterm_output :
00253     (blt_con1[4] == 1'b1) ? {
00254         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[15] ^ minterm_output[15],
00255         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[14] ^ minterm_output[14],
00256         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[13] ^ minterm_output[13],
00257         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[12] ^ minterm_output[12],
00258         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[11] ^ minterm_output[11],
00259         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[10] ^ minterm_output[10],
00260         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[9] ^ minterm_output[9],
00261         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[8] ^ minterm_output[8],
00262         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[7] ^ minterm_output[7],
00263         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[6] ^ minterm_output[6],
00264         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[5] ^ minterm_output[5],
00265         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[4] ^ minterm_output[4],
00266         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[3] ^ minterm_output[3],
00267         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[2] ^ minterm_output[2],
00268         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[1] ^ minterm_output[1],
00269         fill_carry ^ xor_chains[0] ^ minterm_output[0]
00270    } : {
00271         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[15]) | minterm_output[15],
00272         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[14]) | minterm_output[14],
00273         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[13]) | minterm_output[13],
00274         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[12]) | minterm_output[12],
00275         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[11]) | minterm_output[11],
00276         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[10]) | minterm_output[10],
00277         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[9]) | minterm_output[9],
00278         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[8]) | minterm_output[8],
00279         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[7]) | minterm_output[7],
00280         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[6]) | minterm_output[6],
00281         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[5]) | minterm_output[5],
00282         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[4]) | minterm_output[4],
00283         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[3]) | minterm_output[3],
00284         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[2]) | minterm_output[2],
00285         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[1]) | minterm_output[1],
00286         (fill_carry ^ xor_chains[0]) | minterm_output[0]
00287    };
00288 
00289 // DMAEN, BLTEN, USEA, LINE=0
00290 wire a_enabled;
00291 assign a_enabled = (dma_con[9] == 1'b1 && dma_con[6] == 1'b1 && blt_con0[11] == 1'b1 && blt_con1[0] == 1'b0);
00292 // DMAEN, BLTEN, USEB
00293 wire b_enabled;
00294 assign b_enabled = (dma_con[9] == 1'b1 && dma_con[6] == 1'b1 && blt_con0[10] == 1'b1);
00295 // DMAEN, BLTEN, USEC
00296 wire c_enabled;
00297 assign c_enabled = (dma_con[9] == 1'b1 && dma_con[6] == 1'b1 && blt_con0[9] == 1'b1);
00298 // DMAEN, BLTEN, USED
00299 wire d_enabled;
00300 assign d_enabled = (dma_con[9] == 1'b1 && dma_con[6] == 1'b1 && blt_con0[8] == 1'b1);
00301 
00302 always @(posedge CLK_I or negedge reset_n) begin
00303     if(reset_n == 1'b0) begin
00304         CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00305         STB_O <= 1'b0;
00306         WE_O <= 1'b0;
00307         ADR_O <= 30'd0;
00308         SEL_O <= 4'b0000;
00309         master_DAT_O <= 32'd0;
00310         ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00311         blitter_irq <= 1'b0;
00312         blitter_zero <= 1'b0;
00313         blitter_busy <= 1'b0;
00314         
00315         a_first_word_mask <= 16'd0;
00316         a_last_word_mask <= 16'd0;
00317         blt_con0 <= 16'd0;
00318         blt_con1 <= 16'd0;
00319         blt_size <= 16'd0;
00320         blt_width_in_words <= 6'd0;
00321         a_dat <= 64'd0;
00322         b_dat <= 64'd0;
00323         c_dat <= 48'd0;
00324         a_mod <= 16'd0;
00325         b_mod <= 16'd0;
00326         c_mod <= 16'd0;
00327         d_mod <= 16'd0;
00328         a_address <= 32'd0;
00329         b_address <= 32'd0;
00330         c_address <= 32'd0;
00331         d_address <= 32'd0;
00332         a_shift_saved <= 4'd0;
00333         b_shift_saved <= 4'd0;
00334         
00335         a_avail <= 2'd0;
00336         b_avail <= 2'd0;
00337         c_avail <= 2'd0;
00338         line_single <= 1'b0;
00339         fill_carry <= 1'b0;
00340         
00341         max_width <= 1'b0;
00342         
00343         state <= S_IDLE;
00344     end
00345     else begin
00346         
00347         if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && /*WE_I == 1'b1 &&**/ ACK_O == 1'b0) ACK_O <= 1'b1;
00348         else ACK_O <= 1'b0;
00349         
00350         if(blitter_irq == 1'b1) blitter_irq <= 1'b0;
00351         
00352         // 040:     BLTCON0,    BLTCON1,
00353         // 044:     BLTAFWM,    BLTALWM,
00354         // 048:     BLTCPTH,    BLTCPTL,
00355         // 04C:     BLTBPTH,    BLTBPTL,
00356         // 050:     BLTAPTH,    BLTAPTL,
00357         // 054:     BLTDPTH,    BLTDPTL,
00358         // 058:     BLTSIZE,    not used
00359         // 060:     BLTCMOD,    BLTBMOD,
00360         // 064:     BLTAMOD,    BLTDMOD,
00361         // 070:     BLTCDAT,    BLTBDAT,
00362         // 074:     BLTADAT,    not used,
00363         if(CYC_I == 1'b1 && STB_I == 1'b1 && WE_I == 1'b1) begin

00380             if({ ADR_I, 2'b0 } == 9'h050 && SEL_I[0] == 1'b1)  a_address[7:0]  <= slave_DAT_I[7:0];

00431             
00432             
00433             
00434

00442                 if(slave_DAT_I[21:16] == 6'd0) max_width <= 1'b1;

00444                 if(blt_con1[0] == 1'b0 && b_enabled == 1'b0) b_shift_saved <= blt_con1[15:12];
00445                 
00446                 if(blt_con1[0] == 1'b1) begin
00447                     a_dat[63:48] <= 16'd0;
00448                     b_dat[63:48] <= b_dat[47:32];
00449                     a_shift_saved <= blt_con0[15:12];
00450                 end
00451                 else if(reverse == 1'b0) begin
00452                     a_dat[63:48] <= 16'd0;
00453                     b_dat[63:48] <= 16'd0;
00454                 end
00455                 else begin
00456                     a_dat[15:0] <= 16'd0;
00457                     b_dat[15:0] <= 16'd0;
00458                 end
00459                 blitter_zero <= 1'b1;
00460                 blitter_busy <= 1'b1;
00461                 a_avail <= 2'd0;
00462                 b_avail <= 2'd0;
00463                 c_avail <= 2'd0;
00464                 master_DAT_O <= 32'd0;
00465                 line_single <= 1'b0;

00467                 
00468                 state <= S_CHECK_LOAD;
00469             end
00470         end
00471         else if(state == S_CHECK_LOAD) begin
00472         
00473             if(a_enabled == 1'b1 && a_avail < 2'd2)         state <= S_LOAD_A;
00474             else if(b_enabled == 1'b1 && b_avail < 2'd2)    state <= S_LOAD_B;
00475             else if(c_enabled &&
00476                 ((blt_con1[0] == 1'b0 && c_avail < 2'd2) ||
00477                  (blt_con1[0] == 1'b1 && c_avail < 2'd1)))  state <= S_LOAD_C;
00478             else                                            state <= S_CHECK_SAVE;
00479         end
00480         // read max 48 bits
00481         else if(state == S_LOAD_A) begin
00482             
00483             if(ACK_I == 1'b1) begin
00484                 CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00485                 STB_O <= 1'b0;              
00486 /*

00488                         a_address <= a_address + { {16{a_mod[15]}}, a_mod };

00490                         c_address <= c_address + { {16{c_mod[15]}}, c_mod };
00491                         d_address <= d_address + { {16{d_mod[15]}}, d_mod };
00492                     end
00493                     else begin
00494                         a_address <= a_address - { {16{a_mod[15]}}, a_mod };

00500                 a_shift_saved <= blt_con0[15:12];
00501

00506                     else if(blt_size[5:0] == 6'd1)                                                  a_address <= a_address + 32'd2 + { {16{a_mod[15]}}, a_mod };

00508                     else                                                                            a_address <= a_address + 32'd2;                   
00509

00511                         a_dat[47:32] <=     a_first_word_mask &

00513                                             ((a_address[1] == 1'b0)? master_DAT_I[31:16] : master_DAT_I[15:0]);

00523                     else if(blt_size[5:0] == 6'd1)                                                  a_address <= a_address - 32'd2 - { {16{a_mod[15]}}, a_mod };
00524                     else if(a_avail == 2'd1 && blt_width_in_words == 6'd2)                          a_address <= a_address - 32'd2 - { {16{a_mod[15]}}, a_mod };

00541             end

00598         else if(state == S_LOAD_C) begin

00600             if(ACK_I == 1'b1) begin

00609                     else if(blt_size[5:0] == 6'd1)                                                      c_address <= c_address + 32'd2 + { {16{c_mod[15]}}, c_mod };

00642                 SEL_O <= 4'b1111;
00643             end
00644         end
00645         else if(state == S_CHECK_SAVE) begin
00646             
00647             // in LINE mode
00648             if(blt_con1[0] == 1'b1) begin
00649                 if((blt_width_in_words > 6'd0 || max_width == 1'b1) && (blt_size[15:6] > 10'd1 || blt_size[15:6] == 10'd0)) begin    
00650                     
00651                     master_DAT_O <= (d_address[1] == 1'b1) ? { 16'b0, final_output } : { final_output, 16'b0 };
00652

00655                 
00656                     b_shift_saved <= b_shift_saved - 4'd1;
00657                     
00658                     // octet0
00659                     if(blt_con1[4:2] == 3'd6 && a_address[15] == 1'b1 && a_shift_saved != 4'd15) begin
00660                         // no address change
00661                         a_shift_saved <= a_shift_saved + 4'd1;
00662                         c_dat[47:32] <= final_output;
00663                         if(blt_con1[1] == 1'b1) line_single <= 1'b1;
00664                         blt_size[15:6] <= blt_size[15:6] - 10'd1;
00665                     end
00666                     else if(blt_con1[4:2] == 3'd6 && a_address[15] == 1'b1 && a_shift_saved == 4'd15) begin
00667                         c_address <= c_address + 32'd2;
00668                         a_shift_saved <= a_shift_saved + 4'd1;
00669                         if(blt_con1[1] == 1'b1) line_single <= 1'b1;
00670                         state <= S_SAVE_D;
00671                     end
00672                     else if(blt_con1[4:2] == 3'd6 && a_address[15] == 1'b0 && a_shift_saved != 4'd15) begin
00673                         c_address <= c_address - { {16{c_mod[15]}}, c_mod[15:0] };
00674                         a_shift_saved <= a_shift_saved + 4'd1;
00675                         line_single <= 1'b0;
00676                         state <= S_SAVE_D;
00677                     end
00678                     else if(blt_con1[4:2] == 3'd6 && a_address[15] == 1'b0 && a_shift_saved == 4'd15) begin
00679                         c_address <= c_address + 32'd2 - { {16{c_mod[15]}}, c_mod[15:0] };
00680                         a_shift_saved <= a_shift_saved + 4'd1;
00681                         line_single <= 1'b0;
00682                         state <= S_SAVE_D;
00683                     end
00684 
00685                     // octet1
00686                     else if(blt_con1[4:2] == 3'd1 && a_address[15] == 1'b1 && a_shift_saved != 4'd15) begin

00871                 else if((blt_width_in_words > 6'd0 || max_width == 1'b1) && blt_size[15:6] == 10'd1) begin

00873                     state <= S_SAVE_D;
00874                 end
00875                 // after save
00876                 else if(blt_width_in_words == 6'd0 && (blt_size[15:6] > 10'd1 || blt_size[15:6] == 10'd0)) begin    
00877                     blt_size[15:6] <= blt_size[15:6] - 10'd1;
00878                     blt_width_in_words  <= blt_size[5:0];
00879                     if(blt_size[5:0] == 6'd0) max_width <= 1'b1;
00880                     c_avail <= 2'd0;
00881                     d_address <= c_address;
00882                     //if(blt_con1[1] == 1'b1 && c_address == d_address) line_single <= 1'b1;
00883                     
00884                     state <= S_CHECK_LOAD;
00885                 end
00886                 // finish
00887                 else if(blt_width_in_words == 6'd0 && blt_size[15:6] == 10'd1) begin
00888                     blt_con0[15:12] <= 4'd0;
00889                     
00890                     blitter_busy <= 1'b0;
00891                     blitter_irq <= 1'b1;
00892                     state <= S_IDLE;
00893                 end
00894             end
00895             else begin
00896                 if( (blt_width_in_words > 6'd0 || max_width == 1'b1) &&

00899                     (c_enabled == 1'b0 || c_avail > 2'd1))

00902                     fill_carry <= fill_carry ^ xor_chains[15] ^ minterm_output[15];
00903                     state <= S_SAVE_D;
00904                 end
00905                 else if(blt_width_in_words == 6'd0 && blt_size[15:6] == 10'd1) begin
00906                     blitter_busy <= 1'b0;
00907                     blitter_irq <= 1'b1;
00908                     state <= S_IDLE;
00909                 end
00910                 else if(blt_width_in_words == 6'd0 && (blt_size[15:6] > 10'd1 || blt_size[15:6] == 10'd0)) begin
00911                     blt_width_in_words  <= blt_size[5:0];
00912                     if(blt_size[5:0] == 6'd0) max_width <= 1'b1;
00913                     
00914                     fill_carry <= blt_con1[2];
00915                    
00916                     if(reverse == 1'b0) begin
00917                         d_address <= d_address + { {16{d_mod[15]}}, d_mod };
00918                     end
00919                     else begin
00920                         d_address <= d_address - { {16{d_mod[15]}}, d_mod };
00921                     end
00922                    
00923                     blt_size[15:6] <= blt_size[15:6] - 10'd1;
00924                     state <= S_CHECK_LOAD;
00925                 end
00926                 else begin
00927                     state <= S_CHECK_LOAD;
00928                 end
00929             end
00930         end
00931         else if(state == S_SAVE_D) begin
00932             
00933             if(ACK_I == 1'b1 || d_enabled == 1'b0) begin
00934                 CYC_O <= 1'b0;
00935                 STB_O <= 1'b0;
00936                 
00937                 if(a_enabled == 1'b0) begin
00938                     if(reverse == 1'b0)     a_dat[63:48] <= a_dat_final[47:32];
00939                     else                    a_dat[15:0] <= a_dat_final[31:16];
00940                 end
00941                 else if(reverse == 1'b0) begin
00942                     if(blt_width_in_words == 6'd1 && blt_size[15:6] == 10'd1)   a_dat <= { a_dat[47:32], a_dat[47:32], a_dat[47:32], a_dat[47:32] };
00943                     else                                                        a_dat <= { a_dat_final[47:0], 16'b0 };
00944                     a_avail <= a_avail - 2'd1;
00945                 end
00946                 else if(reverse == 1'b1) begin
00947                     if(blt_width_in_words == 6'd1 && blt_size[15:6] == 10'd1)   a_dat <= { a_dat[31:16], a_dat[31:16], a_dat[31:16], a_dat[31:16] };
00948                     else                                                        a_dat <= { 16'b0, a_dat_final[63:16] };
00949                     a_avail <= a_avail - 2'd1;
00950                 end
00951                 
00952                 if(b_enabled == 1'b0) begin
00953                     if(reverse == 1'b0)     b_dat[63:48] <= b_dat[47:32];
00954                     else                    b_dat[15:0] <= b_dat[31:16];
00955                 end
00956                 else if(reverse == 1'b0) begin
00957                     if(blt_width_in_words == 6'd1 && blt_size[15:6] == 10'd1)   b_dat <= { b_dat[47:32], b_dat[47:32], b_dat[47:32], b_dat[47:32] };
00958                     else                                                        b_dat <= { b_dat[47:0], 16'b0 };
00959                     b_avail <= b_avail - 2'd1;
00960                 end
00961                 else if(reverse == 1'b1) begin
00962                     if(blt_width_in_words == 6'd1 && blt_size[15:6] == 10'd1)   b_dat <= { b_dat[31:16], b_dat[31:16], b_dat[31:16], b_dat[31:16] };
00963                     else                                                        b_dat <= { 16'b0, b_dat[63:16] };
00964                     b_avail <= b_avail - 2'd1;
00965                 end
00966

00968                      //; no shift
00969                 end

00971                     if(blt_width_in_words == 6'd1 && blt_size[15:6] == 10'd1)   c_dat <= { c_dat[47:32], c_dat[47:32], c_dat[47:32] };
00972                     else                                                        c_dat <= { c_dat[31:0], 16'b0 };

00974                 end

00977                     else                                                        c_dat <= { 16'b0, c_dat[47:16] };
00978                     c_avail <= c_avail - 2'd1;
00979                 end
00980                 
00981                 if( (d_address[1] == 1'b1 && master_DAT_O[15:0] != 16'd0) ||
00982                     (d_address[1] == 1'b0 && master_DAT_O[31:16] != 16'd0) )
00983                 begin
00984                     blitter_zero <= 1'b0; 
00985                 end
00986                 
00987                 // update d_address and blt_width_in_words
00988                 max_width <= 1'b0;
00989                 if(blt_con1[0] == 1'b1) blt_width_in_words <= 6'd0;
00990                 else                    blt_width_in_words <= blt_width_in_words - 6'd1;
00991                 
00992                 if(blt_con1[0] == 1'b1)     ;
00993                 else if(reverse == 1'b0)    d_address <= d_address + 32'd2;
00994                 else                        d_address <= d_address - 32'd2;
00995                 
00996                 state <= S_CHECK_SAVE;
00997             end
00998             else begin
00999                 CYC_O <= 1'b1;
01000                 STB_O <= 1'b1;
01001                 WE_O <= 1'b1;
01002                 ADR_O <= { 11'b0, d_address[20:2] };
01003                 SEL_O <= (d_address[1] == 1'b1) ? 4'b0011 : 4'b1100;
